definition: wisps of blood/visible veins/(of eyes) bloodshot
silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: Her eyes were bloodshot and swollen.
sentences.chinese: 她的眼睛佈滿血絲，都哭腫了。

sentences.english: Blood-streaked phlegm or hemoptysis occurs in about one-third of the patients.
sentences.chinese: 約三分之一的病人痰中有血絲或咯血。

sentences.english: She had bleary red eyes from lack of sleep.
sentences.chinese: 她由於缺乏睡眠而雙眼昏花，佈滿血絲。

sentences.english: Yes, they’re bloodshot, she said, and changed the subject.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，眼睛裏有血絲，她說，接着轉移了話題。

sentences.english: He long with five hands, stained with bloodshot eyes, makes chilling reading.
sentences.chinese: 他長着五隻手，滿身都是血絲，讓人看了不寒而慄。

sentences.english: He began to expectorate small amounts of blood-streaked sputum.
sentences.chinese: 他開始有少量帶血絲的痰。

sentences.english: Even the pain and redness is reduced by using Aloe-gel.
sentences.chinese: 蘆薈膠還能止痛，減少紅色血絲。

sentences.english: Avene red blood products to professional, you can try.
sentences.chinese: 雅漾有專業去紅血絲的產品，可以去試試。

sentences.english: What is the method with best now silk of remedial red blood?
sentences.chinese: 現在治療紅血絲最好的辦法是什麼啊？

sentences.english: We do often spot bloodstains on large eggs.
sentences.chinese: 人們在大雞蛋上常常可以看到血絲。

sentences.english: My eyes were red and bloodshot. I had lost weight and was as thin as a bean pole.
sentences.chinese: 我兩眼佈滿血絲，體重下降，瘦得像根竹竿。

sentences.english: Could your eyes use some drop to clear up redness?
sentences.chinese: 你的眼睛可以滴點眼藥水來清除血絲嗎？

sentences.english: His eyes were red-rimmed and bloodshot, his face unshaven.
sentences.chinese: 他的眼睛充血，四圍佈滿血絲，也沒有剃臉。
